topics.body:
Since derpibooru is a huge site, with a huge userbase why not instead and often times on sites and such it's extremely easy to get off topic and drift into general chit chat about how someone's day was or such why not just have a thread here for miscellaneous discussions or such.

Basically if you just want to chat or something about whatever with other people.

topics.body:
So how's everyone's weeks going or anything interesting going on?

Me personally I'm about to graduate and pretty much the only thing I'm doing is getting my portfolio together.  Once I graduate and start looking for work I'll start to get back into drawing finally.

topics.body:
I'm doing pretty good. I've been having a busy semester. Only bad thing is, my parents are gonna hate the fact that I don have a job...

I plan to want to start drawing though. I think I'm gonna need a tablet or something too. My OC wants me to draw her already...

topics.body: This is a topic that makes me really angry. I don't know how many minutes of my life get wasted for nothing. Mostly because of waiting. I wait for people that say they come at 12:00 but they actually come at 12:15. *THESE ARE 15 MINUTES OF MY FUCKING LIFE THAT GOT WASTED BECAUSE OF THESE ASSHOLES.*
topics.author: 5091a86b7f123b5fd40013e4

topics.body:
College is so damn boring I'm not even trying anymore. Then again, I have never tried.

Currently I'm stuck in a dilemma of choosing a major. So far I have been studying business, but now I realized it is a stupid idea and I want to switch. Does anyone here happens to know the job market for chemical, biomedical, and biochemical engineer? I have been doing a lot of research online, but apparently each source yields different results.
topics.author: 4fded3ad945b700aaa01381d

topics.body:
My morning, my afternoon, my day, my life...I already been on this train before. Speak truthfully of past events, saying things you later regret. It was a great way of making new companions, but you have to put on a stoic face when they're gone. Then, your later judged by your words, but in silence....
I'm sorry went a little off topic there

My day started out just like any other. Me waking up, thinking. Putting on the same attire for school, red sweater with hand me downs. Then get there, be stared at. go into hallway, stand alone. Wait for teacher, no response. Then go inside, everyday. Later see girl, she chuckles. I think she wants something from me, afraid to ask. see other girl, she ignores me. Now I'm in lunch, library. School will soon end, get on bus and see her. After this go home, and do nothing.

...nah I'm just Joshing with ya
But yeah my life is boringly exciting at times

Today we begin studying contemporary art in my art history class. I expect hipsterism.

I also need to work on a late assignment or two for my advertising class.


Beyond that: I have a drawing project penned in for today and a got a logo for a friend's business I got to do.

"@Background Pony":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5179569f7f123ba52e000622#post_5179569f7f123ba52e000622
[bq="Background Pony"] Later see girl, she chuckles. I think she wants something from me, afraid to ask.[/bq]

GIVE HER THE D-
topics.author: 4fe4bf947f123b175b000001

topics.body:
Last week I was doing groceries when I suddenly almost died.
So I'm not doing anything interesting atm. I can't really move my right arm for six weeks, because I got a pacemaker.
topics.author: 4fe256037f123b3f940028cf

topics.body:
"@QueenCold":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/517979b07f123bd3100015b5#post_517979b07f123bd3100015b5

I know. That was pretty scary.
topics.author: 4fe256037f123b3f940028cf

topics.body:
"@Grieffon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/51793e87a4c72d236500054c#post_51793e87a4c72d236500054c
You think college is boring? I would recommend trying out some science courses. I've been loving the natural science courses, and I've actually decided to major in one of them (Biology), but that's just me...

and uhh... MORE WASTING TIME even though I have homework to do...
topics.author: 505385287f123b1f30000849

topics.body:
"@QueenCold":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/517979b07f123bd3100015b5#post_517979b07f123bd3100015b5

Sorry to hear that Queencold, I hope you are well now.

As for me, my life for these two years (when I got into University) has been finding a balance between graduating and getting my major, going out with friends, wasting time on the computer :P, doing the house chores and taking care of my grandfather since I'm the closest relative he has in the country right now.

Thank God, so far so good, but is exhausting at times; then again, I should be thankful I haven't found myself in the need to look for a job... yet
topics.author: 4fde314a945b700aaa0008d0

topics.body:
"@Vlakc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5179e746a4c72d1f3d0007a8#post_5179e746a4c72d1f3d0007a8
I seriously wish I had your life. Being sick and unemployed sucks.
Anywho, enough with the pity party.

How has the weather been for you guys? Here it's just about as fickle as a Hollywood star's love life.
topics.author: 4fe256037f123b3f940028cf

topics.body:
"@QueenCold":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/517a5ee4a4c72d62db001372#post_517a5ee4a4c72d62db001372

Windy, very windy.
!http://davidortuno.es/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/the-iberian-peninsula-according-to-spain.jpg!

That's how my weather is all-year-long, being Spain's fucking windshield, the temperature now is around 15°C (59°F), so I don't complain.
topics.author: 4fde314a945b700aaa0008d0

topics.body:
"@Vlakc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/517a63997f123b5b6f0006e2#post_517a63997f123b5b6f0006e2
You know what's always fun to do?  Wear like MC Hammer pants and a poncho when it's insanely windy and getting brief air for a second or two.

You just have to be careful to not go too high and to land on your feet otherwise you're in for a bad time.

topics.body: Ugh never bring up video games to my uncle... Seriously he keeps trying to get me to sell him my WiiU and it drives me crazy, i had to make a clever excuse to get him to leave. :/ I feel bad for doing it but i don't want him to take thing from my family when i don't have the right to do it.
